item.description:
Last minute paddle on the POW WOW River from Tuxbury Pond in Amesbury Ma.
The put-in spot is great and the water temp although still chilly wasn't too bad.
I'd still recomend a wet suit but the air temps tomorrow will be close to 80.

We'll paddle up the Pow Wow for about 4-5 miles then return to the put-in.
Bring a snack or lunch as well as water or other fluids to drink while paddling.

Directions to Put-In Launching location

• Take 495 South to Exit 54 Route 150 toward Amesbury
• Go ¼ mile and take a left onto Route 110 West
• After 1.1 miles you’ll see a sign on left “Simplicity/Merrow’s Inc. with an American flag. Take the right just down from this called Kimball Road.
• Go 2 miles and take a right onto Newton Road.
• Look for put-in on the left.

Wetsuits or drysuits recommended.

Life vests must be worn at all times when paddling with this group.
item.name: Pow Wow River Paddle
